channel.title: Leadership on Cloud Nine
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Cloud Nine

item.title: How To Motivate That Guy
item.description: Here you have a header Sample Post Auto Deploy Testy Whether you are dealing with friends, family, co-workers, or employees, there is always that one guy (or gal) who just isn’t getting anything done. Life has got a grip on them, and most of the nasties out there aren’t helping him out. As a leader your job is not to tell people what to do (that’s a boss, by the way).
